message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I'm willing to part with it for $11,500.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, thanks for the offer.  I understand your perspective, but $9,800 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,900?
I'm still a bit short on budget, so I can only go up to $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me there?
